unnormalised: The Municipal Corp. of Delhi (MCD) has a new address for complaints, guys! No more running around in circles. You can now lodge grievances at their new integrated call center. Pretty snazzy, right?
normalised: The Municipal Corporation of Delhi (M-C-D) has a new address for complaints, guys! No more running around in circles. You can now lodge grievances at their new integrated call center. Pretty snazzy, right?

unnormalised: Apparently, the old system was a bit of a mess, with different depts having different numbers and all. Now, everything is streamlined through one single contact point. About time, I say!
normalised: Apparently, the old system was a bit of a mess, with different departments having different numbers and all. Now, everything is streamlined through one single contact point. About time, I say!

unnormalised: The new headquarters, located at Dr. SPM Civic Centre, JLN Marg, Delhi-110002, is supposed to improve response times and make it easier for us, the aam aadmi, to get our issues resolved. Let's hope it actually works!
normalised: The new headquarters, located at Doctor S-P-M Civic Centre, J-L-N Marg, Delhi-one hundred and ten thousand and two, is supposed to improve response times and make it easier for us, the aam aadmi, to get our issues resolved. Let's hope it actually works!

unnormalised: They've even set up a fancy website. Although, I'll be honest, trying to navigate govt websites can be a challenge. But fingers crossed this one is user-friendly.
normalised: They've even set up a fancy website. Although, I'll be honest, trying to navigate government websites can be a challenge. But fingers crossed this one is user-friendly.

unnormalised: Anyways, spread the word! The MCD's new grievance redressal address is Dr. SPM Civic Centre, JLN Marg, Delhi-110002. Let's see if they actually listen this time!
normalised: Anyways, spread the word! The M-C-D's new grievance redressal address is Doctor S-P-M Civic Centre, J-L-N Marg, Delhi-one hundred and ten thousand and two. Let's see if they actually listen this time!
